description:
If initctl isn't present in the image, a shutdown will take (by default) 60 seconds to timeout.

In the case of initctl not being present, we figure this out immediately by way of this error from libvirt:

error: Operation not supported: Container does not provide an initctl pipe

If we detect this, we should abort the retry loop immediately, and switch to the unclean shutdown (_destroy_instance).
title: Fail-fast if initctl isnt present
